p: Crystal structure of SARS and SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro with bound inhibitors were collected from the protein data bank (PDB) [ 30]. PDB ID: 3TNT, SARS main protease was selected as reference to analyse the variants in SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro (PDB ID: 6Y2G). All the PDBs were visualised using UCSF Chimera software [ 31]. Multiple alignment, ribbon, surface and superimposition module in Chimera software were used for analysis and image generation [ 24, 32].
